price: Tàbí kí Ó kó ìparun bá (àwọn ọkọ̀ ojú-omi náà) nítorí ohun tí àwọn èrò ọkọ̀ ojú-omi ṣe (níṣẹ́ aburú). Ó sì ń ṣàmójúkúrò níbi ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀.
arabic: أَوۡ يُوبِقۡهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ وَيَعۡفُ عَن كَثِيرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: aw yūbiq'hunna bimā kasabū wayaʿfu ʿan kathīrin
